title: Therese Coffey – 2019 Statement on the EU Environment Council
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Therese Coffey, the Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, in the House of Commons on 24 June 2019.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/theresecoffey.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/theresecoffey.jpg)

The next EU Environment Council will take place on 26 June, in Luxembourg. I will be attending to represent the UK.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

On environment items, the main legislative focus will be a general approach on the regulation on water-reuse. In addition, there will also be an exchange of views on the environment implementation review (EIR), as well as the adoption of Council conclusions on a sustainable EU chemicals policy.
